Name: 100 hidden rams
About the game: Art by ﾐ人exandr Telminov Important information Press 'N' for night mode. Press 'Del' then 'Esc' to reset all achievements. 100 hidden rams is a hidden object game in a village setting. Black and white hand-drawn graphics in a cartoon style. Interesting and difficult! The clouds are flying by! Cunning rams hid in the big village. Can you find 100 rams? Just click on the ram! Take care of your nerves!
